clients/👨🏻 Potential new beekeepers.title: 👨🏻 Potential new beekeepers
clients/👨🏻 Potential new beekeepers.description: - Someone like Backyard beekeepers or Farmers who wants to take care of bees but is afraid and lacks information

clients/👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers.title: 👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers
clients/👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers.description: - Tech enthusiasts willing to tinker with software and hardware

clients/👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers.title: 👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers
clients/👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers.description: House owner (B2C, not a legal entity)

clients/👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeepers.title: 👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeepers
clients/👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeepers.description: - Pollination services for farmers ~90% of income

clients/👩🏻 Tech scale-up companies.title: 👩🏻 Tech scale-up companies
clients/👩🏻 Tech scale-up companies.description: - High tech companies For example organizations such as LHV, TalTech, Pipedrive do have bees on rooftops

clients/👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers.title: 👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers
clients/👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers.description: An extension of Backyard beekeepers, but in city area where main concern is ability to inspect bees without too much swarming hassle affecting neighbours

clients/🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers.title: 🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers
clients/🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers.description: - Main motivation - improving yields Insufficient pollination

company/Culture and values 🫀/Adapt to ch.title: Adapt to change 🏕️
company/Culture and values 🫀/Adapt to ch.description: Be bold, get things done, take responsibility. Get hands dirty, take small steps, be prepared, survive, speed, autonomy, freedom

company/Culture and values 🫀/Ethical hea.title: Ethical heart 🌳
company/Culture and values 🫀/Ethical hea.description: Care about sentient organisms. Go beyond product to have sustainable ecosystem and environment. Balance work and life

company/Culture and values 🫀/Gather valu.title: Gather value 🍯
company/Culture and values 🫀/Gather valu.description: Bring value, create symbiotic relations, enrich all parties. We bring value to beekeepers and to our team. Grow wider in your abilities and knowledge to bring more impact.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Humbly kind.title: Humbly kind 🧸
company/Culture and values 🫀/Humbly kind.description: Be empathetic, support, teach. Everyone makes mistakes. Accepting flaws with kindness leads to unity and trust.

company/Culture and values 🫀/index.title: Culture and values 🫀
company/Culture and values 🫀/index.description: Cultural values affects how we do things internally, which clients and employees align with us.

company/Culture and values 🫀/New horizon.title: New horizons 🏔️
company/Culture and values 🫀/New horizon.description: Reach mastery and wisdom. Improve continuously, grow above yourself, define new norm, withstand the test of time, quality, performance. Reach equilibrium of opposing values, opinions and responsibilities.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Observable.title: Observable mind 🧿
company/Culture and values 🫀/Observable.description: Value rationalism, science, innovation that has built the modern civilisation. Cultivate creative and critical thinking, data-driven decisions and experimentation

company/Culture and values 🫀/Radiate tru.title: Radiate truth 🌞
company/Culture and values 🫀/Radiate tru.description: Be joyful and honest, have fun. Our code and processes are transparent to the world. Communicate to reduce boundaries, complexity, be predictable to be trusted.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Team effort.title: Team effort 🐝
company/Culture and values 🫀/Team effort.description: Be part of the collective, make friends, communicate, lead by example, equal voice, take ownership, disagree and commit

company/equity.title: Equity & fundraising program plan 🦚
company/equity.description: 💡 This page is summarizing the rough plan of the equity program for the employees, founders, investors and advisors.

company/index.title: 👔 Company
company/index.description: 💡 This is a placeholder page for how the company should like.

company/Meeting recordings.title: Meeting recordings 🎥
company/Meeting recordings.description: Following Radiate truth 🌞 values, we are transparent in internal communications, which is important in modern asynchroneous world. Thats why we record important meetings.

company/Roles/Response templates/Respons.title: Response templates
company/Roles/Response templates/Respons.description: If you’re reading this and thinking “what, a template? generic answers?”, then yes.

company/Roles/Roles.title: Roles
company/Roles/Roles.description: Here we list roles that are needed for company operation

index.title: Overview
index.description: Gratheon is a garage-phase bootstrapping startup with big dreams. See 📑 deck for quick overview.

Problems/❄️ Overwintering collapse.title: ❄️ Overwintering collapse
Problems/❄️ Overwintering collapse.description: Bees can die over the winter if they are too weak as they cannot warm themselves and its brood

Problems/🌲 Distant locations.title: 🌲 Distant locations
Problems/🌲 Distant locations.description: If your apiaries are far away (forest, rural area), you need to drive for inspections.

Problems/🌻 Insufficient pollination.title: 🌻 Insufficient pollination
Problems/🌻 Insufficient pollination.description: Food security - 735.1M undernourished people worldwide according to FAO in 2022

Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new b.id: Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new b.title: 🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new b.description: Beekeeping is a vast knowledge area that is hard to gain at the beginning without proper education, keep up to date of.

Problems/🏘️ Multiple apiaries.title: 🏘️ Multiple apiaries
Problems/🏘️ Multiple apiaries.description: Related to 💪🏻 Unscalable work, problem is that with growth of the colony numbers, beekeepers need to place bees closer and more even across the land to avoid 🌻 Insufficient pollination

Problems/🐭 Mice killing a colony.title: 🐭 Mice killing a colony
Problems/🐭 Mice killing a colony.description: In summer a hive of 50,000 to 60,000 bees can defend itself against intruders like mice. In winter population is reduced to 20,000 bees. Too cold to fly out and defend. The mice urinate and deficate on frames and destroy the wax foundations.

Problems/🐻 Bears destroying hives & colo.title: 🐻 Bears destroying hives & colonies
Problems/🐻 Bears destroying hives & colo.description: Bears attack colonies and they cannot recover after that.

Problems/👁️ Observability of bee colony.title: 👁️ Observability of bee colony
Problems/👁️ Observability of bee colony.description: Hard to make decisions without up-to-date and correct information about the colony development. Decisions can be about splitting the hive, treating against varroa mites, closing the hive entrance for defence, adding a new queen, adding or removing frames with brood or honey/polle

Problems/💀 Alcohol washing killing bees.title: 💀 Alcohol washing killing bees
Problems/💀 Alcohol washing killing bees.description: Alcohol-washing bees to detect varroa mites kills 100-300 bees just to have observability

Problems/💀 Intrusive inspections.title: 💀 Intrusive inspections
Problems/💀 Intrusive inspections.description: - Squashing of bees when hive sections and frames are moved and placed on top of each other

Problems/💢 Aggressive bee colonies.title: 💢 Aggressive bee colonies
Problems/💢 Aggressive bee colonies.description: Hard to inspect, can get stings through the suit

Problems/💢 Hornet attacks.title: 💢 Hornet attacks
Problems/💢 Hornet attacks.description: Hornets (Vespa) can wipe out beehive colony

Problems/💪🏻 Physical labor.title: 💪🏻 Physical labor
Problems/💪🏻 Physical labor.description: Lifting hive sections with honey, especially being in a suit while its hot outside

Problems/💪🏻 Unscalable work.title: 💪🏻 Unscalable work
Problems/💪🏻 Unscalable work.description: Linear scaling of physical work as you add more hives and as they grow in height

Problems/📦 Warehouse organization.title: 📦 Warehouse organization
Problems/📦 Warehouse organization.description: Beekeepers need to maintain various warehouse management tasks and organize their equipment

Problems/🗃️ Flimsy beehives.title: 🗃️ Flimsy beehives
Problems/🗃️ Flimsy beehives.description: Weather can have detrimental effect on the colony survival.

Problems/🗃️ Poor hive ventilation.title: 🗃️ Poor hive ventilation
Problems/🗃️ Poor hive ventilation.description: Some beehives have poor ventilation. Bees during winter die because of this ❄️ Overwintering collapse

Problems/🗃️ Ugly beehives.title: 🗃️ Ugly beehives
Problems/🗃️ Ugly beehives.description: - Bricks on roof against the wind

Problems/🦀 Infestations.title: 🦀 Infestations
Problems/🦀 Infestations.description: Hive infestations weaken colonies, lead to viral infections, cause deformed wings, uncapped pupae

Problems/🧶 Swarming.title: 🧶 Swarming
Problems/🧶 Swarming.description: Swarming is natural and good. This is how bee colony reproduces.

Problems/index.title: 🌨️ Problems
Problems/index.description: 💡 Hard, frequent, unscalable work to keep bees healthy for precise pollination and food security

products/📱Web-app/community-tier/📍 Show.description: This feature is very similar to Apiary position sharing. But instead of using data of our registered users, we want to import and synchronize data from governmental registries, so that users do not need to go outside of the app but can still see relevant information

products/📱Web-app/community-tier/🧑‍🚀 Use.id: products/📱Web-app/community-tier/🧑‍🚀 User email verification and change
products/📱Web-app/community-tier/🧑‍🚀 Use.title: 🧑‍🚀 User email verification and change

products/📱Web-app/community-tier/🙅 User.title: 🙅 User account deletion
products/📱Web-app/community-tier/🙅 User.description: As a requirement for https://support.google.com/googleplay/android-developer/answer/13327111 we need to comply and allow account deletion along with related data

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/☀️ Sola.id: products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/☀️ Solar radiance as weather datasource
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/☀️ Sola.title: ☀️ Solar radiance as weather datasource
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/☀️ Sola.description: Hypothesis is that the sun can influence bee behaviour as well as plants secreting the nectar.

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/♻️ QR-c.title: ♻️ QR-code printing & scanning
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/♻️ QR-c.description: - This may be useful for Industrial beekeepers with 100 hives that don’t use numeric system or don’t want to search for it in the app.

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/♻️ Shar.id: products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/♻️ Share of beehive inspection public URL
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/♻️ Shar.title: ♻️ Share of beehive inspection public URL
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/♻️ Shar.description: Similar to Apiary position sharing, we want to have more social / growth loop like features that will allow collaboration between beekeepers.

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🌻 Flowe.title: 🌻 Flower blooming map
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🌻 Flowe.description: Idea is to show when specific flower within apiary vicinity is blooming.

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🍭 Feedi.title: 🍭 Feeding management
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🍭 Feedi.description: So the goal of this set of features is to allow beekeeper to mark colony as having a treatment (sugar syrup, tymol candy etc.). This is very similar to Varroa Treatment diary.

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🐝 Frame.title: 🐝 Frame analysis - chilled brood
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🐝 Frame.description: when colony is not large enough to maintain temparature of the entire brood nest

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/📡 Offli.title: 📡 Offline mode
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/📡 Offli.description: We kinda started doing this on frontend, but needs more testing

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/📦 Manua.id: products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/📦 Manual inspections - Bulk file upload
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/📦 Manua.title: 📦 Manual inspections - Bulk file upload

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Aler.title: 🔔  Alerts
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Aler.description: We want to notify beekeeper in various cases/features. For that we need a generic way to create and list alerts. We want to store alerts in DB and display them in UI.

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame.id: products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame analysis - spotty brood pattern detection
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame.title: 🔔 Frame analysis - spotty brood pattern detection
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame.description: spotty laying pattern = bad cells, brood pathogen of larvae, queen failure

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame.id: products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame analysis - starvation detection and alert
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame.title: 🔔 Frame analysis - starvation detection and alert
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🔔 Frame.description: - little capped honey or nectar in the hive

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🤖 Beeke.title: 🤖 Beekeeping advice with LLM
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🤖 Beeke.description: We want AI to give assistance to a beekeeper based on overall status of the beehive, taking into account all available context

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🦀 Varro.title: 🦀 Varroa infestation management
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🦀 Varro.description: This is a parent feature of

products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🛰️ Apia.title: 🛰️ Apiary satellite view
products/📱Web-app/essential-tier/🛰️ Apia.description: See also Pollination optimization with hive placement recommendation

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/↔️ Create col.title: ↔️ Create colony split
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/↔️ Create col.description: Similar to Multiple colony unification, beekeepers at the summer may have very big colonies that they want to split to prevent swarming.

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/⚖️ Colony com.title: ⚖️ Colony comparison
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/⚖️ Colony com.description: Like git diff, for analysis you may want to compare colony development over time

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌎 Map view.title: 🌎 Map view
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌎 Map view.description: Goal is for Industrial beekeepers to be able to see the big picture of their apiaries to

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌞 Apiary top-.id: products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌞 Apiary top-down view of  relative to the sun
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌞 Apiary top-.title: 🌞 Apiary top-down view of  relative to the sun
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌞 Apiary top-.description: Very related to Apiary satellite view, here we care about beehive placement relative to the sun and shade

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌻 Pollination.id: products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌻 Pollination optimization with hive placement recommendation
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌻 Pollination.title: 🌻 Pollination optimization with hive placement recommendation
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🌻 Pollination.description: - Find specific crop fields for specialized (buckweed) pollination and honey harvesting

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🎮 Device mana.title: 🎮 Device management
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🎮 Device mana.description: To ease connecting web-app to Entrance Observer, Beehive IoT sensors, Robotic Beehive and other third-party ([Beep.nl weight telemetry integration](https://www.notion.so/Beep-nl-weight-telemetry-integration-a72ed2ce25004a3c853bb41fa08abc48?pvs=21)) we need a separate view for managing devices.

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐜 Ant detecti.title: 🐜 Ant detection
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐜 Ant detecti.description: Colony can fully leave the hive in case of (argentine) ant infestation, so this is an important task

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Analytics -.title: 🐝 Analytics - demography and simulation
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Analytics -.description: - With bee demography, beekeepers can unify colonies to help with overwitnering

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Bee age cla.title: 🐝 Bee age classification
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Bee age cla.description: like with human societies, we need to evaluate demographical column of the colony

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Bee pose -.title: 🐝 Bee pose - morphometric model
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Bee pose -.description: The precondition of this feature is an access to video as a source. So either

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Wax moth de.title: 🐝 Wax moth detection
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🐝 Wax moth de.description: Wax moths typically take over very weak colonies or stored bee frames. So this is a low-priority detection

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📅 Google-cale.title: 📅 Google-calendar integration
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📅 Google-cale.description: To help beekeepers do Varroa Treatment diary and plan their events without the need of using our app all the time, we should integrate popular google calendar to synchronize events

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📅 Varroa Trea.title: 📅 Varroa Treatment diary
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📅 Varroa Trea.description: For anti-varroa treatment, it would be nice to have ability to mark last time a colony was treated

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📦 Harvest hiv.id: products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📦 Harvest hive frames and sections
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📦 Harvest hiv.title: 📦 Harvest hive frames and sections

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📦 Inventory m.title: 📦 Inventory management - warehouse view
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/📦 Inventory m.description: We want beekeepers to be aware of their apiary state

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🤖 Talk to bee.id: products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🤖 Talk to bee colony with AI
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🤖 Talk to bee.title: 🤖 Talk to bee colony with AI

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🪝 Webhooks in.title: 🪝 Webhooks integration
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🪝 Webhooks in.description: Similar to other integreations like Google-calendar integration, here the idea is to allow user to register a URL (webhook) that we will deliver some event to. For example a new hive added, a frame analyzed etc.

products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🪲 Hive beetle.title: 🪲 Hive beetle detection
products/📱Web-app/pro-tier/🪲 Hive beetle.description: - bees can't really attack hive beetles

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🎮 Clien.description: This task is about controlling robot fully locally (offline). For this we need an app and a UI.

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🐝 Bee n.description: Video inferencing of on-frame nursing behaviour and bee tracking

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🐝 Bee s.title: 🐝 Bee specialization classification
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🐝 Bee s.description: We want to show demographics of bee colony for beekeeper to know about development cycle

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🔥 Hive.title: 🔥 Hive heating
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🔥 Hive.description: Idea is to have hive heated from the bottom to combat varroa. For winter time this may also help in case of harsh degrees

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Movea.id: products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Moveable hive bottom with varroa counting
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Movea.title: 🦾 Moveable hive bottom with varroa counting
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Movea.description: The idea here is to have hive bottom painted white and have it extracted into the hive robotic area such that we could take a photo, upload it to the web-app and count detected varroa mites to help measuring Varroa infestation management

products/index.title: 🍯 Products
products/index.description: Our products are in development and are a mix of software and hardware, complimenting each other and offering data gathering, analytics and actionable decisions that a beekeeper would need to solve day to day Problems

purpose/Ethics.title: Ethics ☯️
purpose/Ethics.description: Ethics is a branch of philosophy that deals with the study of what is morally right or wrong, good or bad.

purpose/index.title: 🌻 Purpose
purpose/index.description: Automating beekeeping 🐝 with AI vision and robots 🤖

purpose/Naming.title: Naming
purpose/Naming.description: Company name has multiple meanings on different layers, so there is no definitive answer

purpose/Symbolism.title: Symbolism
purpose/Symbolism.description: Colors represent main wavelengths that 🐝 bees can see, company values and other associations:
